pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# dictdaora

Dicts that can be accessed via attributes

---**Documentation**: **Source Code**: ---## Key Features- Print hello world on screen **\* feature in development.*## Requirements - Python 3.8+## Instalation```$ pip install dictdaora```## Basic example```pythonprint('Hello World!')``````Hello World!```## Complex example```pythonimport jsonprint(json.dumps(dict(hello='Hello', world='World!')))``````{"hello": "Hello", "world": "World!"}```
